items.sentence: Tom and Mary told us they wouldn\'t fight anymore.
You should eat something a little more nutritious.
How did you know Tom wouldn\'t be able to do that?
I think you want this more than you want to admit.
I thought I was doing this the way you told me to.
Are you sure we\'re talking about the same person?
Tom decided to wait until Mary had some free time.
Tom deposited 1,000 dollars in his saving account.
The police were at the scene before Tom got there.
I get the feeling I\'m sleeping too much recently.
Is there any chance you could be ready in an hour?
It looks like Tom has lost a button off his shirt.
You aren\'t really going to vote for Tom, are you?
You aren\'t supposed to help Tom do that, are you?
You aren\'t the only one Tom has cheated, are you?
You asked for my advice, so I\'m giving it to you.
I\'m pretty sure Tom has fallen in love with Mary.
I\'m pretty sure Tom is going to be there tonight.
I\'m sorry. It was only meant as a harmless prank.
I wonder whether or not Tom has done that already.
